review_text:
Andrew, WOW!. The Building was carefully redone all details considered.
The room 104 was magnificent, with tastefully decorations and pix of Mansfield.
Remembering how the Bissman building front door was. The Voegele kept the front entrance intact, with the stairs and the offices to the right & left of the stairs , converted to the large living room , to the right and bedroom to the left. The wonderful high ceilings, made the suite so open and spacious. Loved how easy to enter using lock codes, not having to fuss with keys. Wonderfully brought up to date, Elevator, modern appliances.
(got the see the room 404 how clean and modern and tastefully decorated, different from 104.)
This place is fantastic! Andrew is very hospitable host!
My go to in Mansfield Ohio. Every stay is wonderful and consistent. Excellent responsive host. Record player and albums get me excited every time.

Well-decorated, large and spacious apartment that was clean. It had everything we needed. Cool to stay in a historic building. Nice to be greeted by Andrew who provided a lot of good information to help us enjoy the area.
It was a beautiful beautiful weekend! Thank you! We hope to be back! Bret and Misha

This is what an AIRBNB should be: beautiful, clean, great host, easy access, and everything you need for a wonderful stay. Andrew was very accommodating, he met us upon our arrival and showed us around his place. His place was spotless, one of the cleanest AIRBNBs we've stayed. He has great decor too. Even had a record player with a ton of albums available to play. There are several local restaurants within walking distance (5-15 minute walk). I wish we could have stayed longer, we were only in town for a quick weekend getaway to visit Westmeister Farms in nearby Shelby. But if we ever make it back to town we will definitely book our stay here. I highly recommend it.

Our stay was fantastic! The place is historic and beautiful. We loved the amenities, a record player, a big kitchen that we took advantage of, and an electric fireplace. It’s located really close to downtown where we visited phoenix brewery. It was also a great home base for hiking in Mohican state park and skiing at snow trails. Andrew was really friendly and easy to communicate with. We would definitely stay here again!
Excellent location and loved the apartment. 5 Star on all counts. Andrew was fabulous! Will definitely be back.

Our son and daughter-in-law, Stacy and Renee Beauford stayed 4 nights at the Voegele! We booked them there because we knew it was amazing! They enjoyed their stay and we loved having them here! They really enjoyed the privacy, quiet and gorgeous surroundings! Thank you, Andrew, for helping make our holiday perfect and giving us enough room at our condo so our grandsons could stay with us! Will book every time we have out of town guests!
Great place to stay in Mansfield. Impeccably furnished, squeaky clean, and just a great apartment. Andrew was very responsive.

Very convenient location to shops and restaurants in the Carousel District. Parking in the building's lot was very convenient. Although there could be a little bit of traffic noise at times, this was not a big deal. Staying in a historic building was a big plus, as the new details were very in sync with the original building. The interior was really, really nice, and everything was well maintained.
Andrew was extremely nice and flexible with the booking. His place is gorgeous!

This 1-bedroom apartment in the Voegele Historic Lofts in downtown Mansfield is so cool! It was in perfect walkable proximity to the downtown. Our anniversary trip centered around dinner at Prohibition at the Caverns but we also hit Final Friday, dinner at Hudson & Essex, the Prairie Peddler Festival and Phoenix Brewing. Andrew was proactive about coordinating a flexible check-in, and we appreciated the personal touch of meeting him at check-in, hearing the story of the lofts, and getting his recommendations. We loved how it was so thoughtfully decorated, it smelled so good, and we enjoyed utilizing the outdoor space as well. Highly recommend!

Words and photos cannot accurately describe this apartment, you must see it in person!
It’s absolutely gorgeous, and the building is very secure with exterior door lock codes and outdoor lighting. We had an amazing view of the Bissman building right outside our windows.
The back yard is wonderful! Very private and peaceful, with so many places to lounge along with multiple fire pits.
Andrew was very responsive, friendly and helpful the whole weekend.
The location is great for any downtown event you want to go to. We didn’t use the car one time while we were there, everything is accessible by walking.

I book this Air BnB for business, and every guest we’ve had stay here raves about how beautiful the space is. The host is excellent; very responsive and easy to communicate with. This place is truly a gem for Mansfield and sure to amaze any guest!
Such a treat to stay a Andrew's place... so many beautiful design details. I felt very comfortable and at home here during my 4 day work trip :)

Andrew was a fantastic host.He was extremely nice and knowledgeable of the area. The loft was so much more than in the pictures. The bed was extremely comfortable, the shower had fantastic water pressure and the building itslef was very quiet. All the lights, ceiling fans, and temperature controls are very easy to operate. We will definitely be back and recommeding this place to all of our friends that head that way.
Andrew was a wonderful host and I thoroughly enjoyed my stay! This is my new home away from home when I visit my hometown. Thank you Andrew!
Andrew’s place is beautiful and very relaxing. Andrew’s dinner recommendations were perfect too. We were in town for Shawshank Hustle and the location was great!
Always a pleasure to stay in Andrew’s space. Clean, quiet, and beautiful! Would recommend and stay again

Andrew is a great host and shared his knowledge of the North End of downtown Mansfield.
Will definitely stay here again and recommend to friends and family coming to stay in Mansfield for a few days.

We had an amazing stay at Andrews BNB. The apartment exceeded our expectations and was beautifully decorated. Highly recommend to everyone. Andrew was super helpful with recommendations and a lovely person.
the place was super clean and awesome not to mention Andrew. that dude is cool as hell

We were in town for a family wedding & the apartment at the Voegele was perfect! Beautifully updated historical building so close to downtown & to the wedding venue. We were able to walk to places to eat & and brewery. Andrew was a wonderful host— thanks for a great stay!

Our stay was wonderful. The location right in the downtown area makes it so easy to walk/drive to restaurants and shops. The place itself is beautiful and so unique. It is spacious, clean and has all the amenities you need. Andrew is a great host and was helpful and responsive the entire stay. I would highly recommend this place and we will definitely be back!

The Voegele Historic Loft Air BnB is a true gem in downtown Mansfield. The character is so charming, and it’s been beautifully renovated. I would recommend this Air BnB to anyone staying in Mansfield. It’s clean, lovely, and walkable to downtown shops. Andrew was an incredibly welcoming and accommodating host.
If your travels take you to Mansfield, Ohio this is a must stay place. historic, lovely and well decorated. great location to attend Midohio sports car course.

Andrew's place is large and beautiful--incredibly high ceilings!--and was in a perfect location for our needs. The host is on-site and is therefore very accessible and responsive. We would definitely want to stay there again, should the opportunity arise.

This was our second stay with Andrew and the place was breathtaking, clean, and cozy.
We come to Mansfield 2-3 times a year for racing and will continue to book here!
Believe the reviews! Andrews property and attentiveness are excellent! We couldn’t be more satisfied with our stay.
This has to be absolutely the best available in Mansfield. One of the best I have ever had on Airbnb in every category. We loved it.
Well Appointed. Walkable and accessible to entire downtown area.

It was an amazing place that takes you back to when craftsmanship was a big part of building the community.
It is a very regal setting with soaring punch tin ceilings and a remarkable touch of taste with golds and black leather.
They place had a very historic feel with a built in museum to your stay.
I will be coming back to this again.
I’m a avid traveler-There is a wonderful bed with blackout velvet curtains that gave me a great sleep to. That sometimes is as good as a vacation.

The photos don’t do this place justice! Truly a gem for the area. My husband and I stayed for almost a whole week and felt right at home. Sits right next to a noisy street but that is the ONLY complaint. Highly recommend!
Pictures couldn't give this place justice. Amazing space, and amazing host
Beautifully decorated, comfortable, safe and great parking. Amazing host.
This place was absolutely amazing! The pictures don’t capture the beauty of this place! The host was kind and respectable. We will be coming back!
Always a pleasure staying in Andrew’s beautiful space! No issues, very clean, easy to check in and out, and unique. Would recommend and stay again

Best air bnb in Mansfield.
Highly recommend. 10/10
Such an awesome stay! Super cool place, will definitely be staying again.
A fantastic place to stay!

Andrew is a great host! He reserved a parking spot for us right outside the loft and met us when we arrived to show us around. The loft is awesome, it has historic charm, is nicely decorated, and was very clean and comfortable! We would love to return for another long weekend in the future.
The place was so nice and compared to other options in the area a no-brainer. Stay in this really cool place!!!
We greatly enjoyed our stay at The Voegele in Mansfield. The place is beautiful, convenient to restaurants, breweries and bars downtown, and Andrew was a welcoming host.
Great big city feel. Love the decor and amenities.

Amazing apartment.
Great location
The attention to detail in this place is incredible!
The Loft is beautiful and in great location! Very comfortable and clean! Andrew is very kind and responsive. Would recommend!

This place was wonderful. It was clean, the architecture was awesome, and the location was a short walk away from bakeries, restaurants, and the brewery. Andrew was super nice and gave us great suggestions for restaurants and places to check out. I would highly recommend staying here.

Our stay couldn't of been better. Andrew was highly communicative and responsive. Pictures don't do the place justice. It is beautiful, designed with such care and though, well taken care of, and definitely put together with the visitor in mind. The bed is extremely comfortable, the water pressure is great in the shower, they offer streaming services on the television, and there is just everything you could need. It is hands down the most beautiful place you can stay in Mansfield. Wish I could give 10 stars.
Such a cute place! And a great alternative to local hotels. Central location, easy parking and airbnb access. Charming interiors and insane ceilings!!! Would stay again next time I’m in town.
The place is beautiful and full of charm. The furniture is super comfortable. Great location by downtown and private. One can tell the host pays a lot of attention to detail.

Beautiful place, lovely space, and in a great location. The only issues we had were a banister on top of the curtains falling not once but twice during the stay around 2am. I would also like to see a checklist for checkout implemented for this host as we were charged for leaving the banister down, and for apparently misplacing the insert in the trash can without much more description.

Highly recommend staying here if you are coming to Mansfield. This is a well taken care of apartment that was in the perfect location for us. Nothing is overlooked plenty of comfort. Wish we could have stayed longer!

This place is perfect for your Mansfield OH stay!! Andrew is quick to reply and is detail oriented from the flameless candles, blue tooth speaker, record player, coffee, FULL size shampoo and conditioner!! The location is central to so many activities including the Shawshank trail so fun!! I cannot say enough about this place. Just book it!!! Stop looking…you found your place:) five stars
Hope to see you again Mansfield I know where I’ll be landing:) next time.

This apartment was beautifully decorated and appointed. We were taken with the historic space, high ceilings and light. It was a comfortable space and we appreciated being able to walk to a local coffee spot and a brewery. The record player and albums were also a treat to enjoy! Would stay again next time we’re in Mansfield.
Andrew was very flexible with us. He was quick to respond with everyquestion and was very informed. He was willing to work on a last moment booking and we appreciate it very much.

This is a lovely space, conveniently located within steps of downtown. The apartment is decorated tastefully ( no “Live, Laugh, Love!” plaques in sight) and tbh the kitchen is nicer than mine at home. We especially loved the turntable and classic 70s record albums. There is a little traffic sound from Main Street and the railroad at night—not a big deal for a city-dweller like myself, but take note if you’re a light sleeper. I’d be delighted to live full time in such a beautiful apartment.

Pictures do not do it justice. Was one of the nicest places I've stayed at. Also if you are doing the shawshank trail, this building is in the movie for just a second (still really cool as we were watching the movie there, and saw where we were staying). Would 100% stay again, and will recommend to everyone who is interested in doing the trail or visiting Mansfield.
Gorgeous apartment, in a great location! Really spacious, nicely decorated, and a pleasure to stay at for 3 weeks. Definitely recommend it! It’s pretty quiet too!
amazing property, tons of history! host was super accommodating, even with me arriving very late due to a delayed flight. will absolutely stay there again!
Great location to downtown. Awesome host made for a relaxing weekend away from the kids. Would highly recommend this stay to others!
We had a wonderful time. Beautiful space with lovely accommodations. Would definitely stay again!

Andrew’s place was perfect for our short stay in Mansfield. The place is architecturally beautiful. It feels like someplace special. The location is very convenient; within easy walking distance to several eateries, a coffee shop/bakery, and a brewery. There is a comfortable community outdoor space that was nice in the evenings. And on site parking was a plus. We felt safe during our stay. We can’t think of any amenities we wish we felt we were missing. Andrew was a very welcoming host. He spent time with us upon arrival, familiarizing us with the Airbnb and community, and to answer any questions. He was very approachable and easy to reach if we had any needs.

If your visiting Mansfield or anywhere in Richland County, you'll be hard-pressed to find an AirBnB or hotel that offers the luxury, comfort and value of Andrew's loft apartment. We visited to explore the Ohio State Reformatory, and then go hiking in Mohican State Park. The location of this AirBnB was perfect. After exploring all day, we relaxed on the comfy couch with the fireplace on, playing records from the eclectic selection available. The location makes it easy to venture out and walk around downtown Mansfield, where there are cute shops, amazing architecture, great food and even a brewery and winery. It was always a welcome surprise to enter the loft at the end of the day. No expense was spared on amenities, comfort and décor. Andrew was a great host, as well. We showed up later than anticipated, but he was there to greet us with a smile and give us a tour of the property. He gave us ideas for things to do in town, provided brochures for local attractions, and left his card with us in case we needed anything during our stay. I can go on and on, but you truly have to experience this loft for yourself. The pictures can only convey so much. If you love historical buildings, luxury accommodations, convenience and value, then this is the place for you. We're looking forward to retuning here again in the future!

It was a pleasure to stay in this beautifully renovated building, full of historic charm and all the modern conveniences. In additon, Andrew was very personally welcoming and kind. We may return in the future with our kids!
This place is in such a great location. Such a unique beautiful place. Andrew is a great host!
Highly recommend Andrew’s place. Very charming decor and all the needed amenities. Andrew was a fantastic host.

This air bnb is wonderful !
10/10 highly recommend. Beyond the impeccable cleanliness, excellent location and wonderful natural light my personal favorite was the record player and the wonderful album collection of some of the worlds favorites !
The host is super responsive and helpful.
I will definitely be back.
Great place to stay! Clean, cozy and very comfortable historical building! Informative and responsive host.

We were lucky enough to book this amazing space as part of an 80th birthday event as a gathering place and somewhere for our son and his wife to stay! It is stunning and had every convenience you could imagine. We all want to just move in! The furnishings, vibe, parking, ambiance were exceptional. The host was so accommodating and the place was spotless! Every connivence was well above our expectations right down to access to the cleaning crew and building super! Our niece is planning on booking several weeks so part of her work trips! Thank you Andrew for helping make this event a success!

We stayed here for a weekend while in town for a wedding at Kingwood. The place seems to have a deep history which can be seen in the woodwork, ceilings, and layout. It's a beautiful apartment packed with everything you could need. We relaxed with the record player and electric fireplace going at night. Very easy walk to a brewery, the carousel, restaurants, diners, and coffee shops.

Andrew was great, we was very responsive if we needed anything. The place is exactly as described and exactly what we were looking for. Perfect location and the only place we’ll stay when we go back to Mansfield.

Decided last minute to get out of town and found this historic and beautifully renovated loft in a restored 1897 building. Andrew was everything you could hope for in a host, he was quick and thorough with communication from the start. He met us at the door to let us in and gave us a tour of the loft and it's amenities and offered suggestions for restaurants and places of interest. The loft is gorgeous and very comfortable with everything you would need. We especially enjoyed the turntable and listening to records in the morning with our coffee. We found the bedroom very nice with one of the most comfortable beds we've ever slept in! The loft is located only a few blocks from the downtown which has many historical buildings and impressive architecture. You'll find a few nice restaurants, some shops, bars and a brewery. If you're into breweries, we found the Phoenix Brewing Co in Mansfield had average beers but a great atmosphere. We found that Uniontown Brewing in Ashland, OH(25 min. drive) to have very good beers with excellent food. And if you're into biking, check out the B&O Rail Trail that starts in Mansfield and heads through the towns of Lexington and Bellville about 18 miles south to the town of Butler. We really enjoyed our stay at the Voegele loft. Thanks, Andrew!

This has been my favorite property thus far! Phenomenal location right on the Shawshank trail and near Mansfield’s Carousel district which has great food options with a small-town feel, antique shops, bakery, tea cafe, and even a functional, indoor carousel right in the center of it all.

After visiting the Ohio State Reformatory this property kept me securely locked in that historic “step-back-in-time” feeling, but with all the modern conveniences I could possibly ask for thanks to its recent, luxurious renovation inside a beautiful, historic building. Everything seemed brand new, but still felt like I was in a completely different era where art and craftsmanship mattered when constructing a building. The photos do not do it justice, it has RGB LED lighting in the bathroom and kitchen, remote led candles everywhere for ambience, good collection of vinyl records to play on the vinyl player, surround soundbar in the living room, smart TV in the bedroom, even a bluetooth speaker for the shower built into the ceiling so I truly felt right at home because I didn’t even need to use the travel speaker that I brought; the host seemed to have thought of everything! Honestly, I did not want to leave this property, plus one of the Shawshank trail movie sites is literally next door, with another (Carousel Antiques) just down the street; perfect for a history fanatic like myself and my day of traveling the trail. I spent my second day in Cleveland, but was thrilled to escape from the hustle of the city to this property that night to teleport back-in-time again for relaxation after a long day.
Parking was excellent and convenient in the building’s parking lot located at the side of the building which is always important to me since I prefer to keep my car off of city streets (I’m a car guy so persnickety about where I park my ride). The host was extremely helpful, knowledgeable, quick to communicate, and his recommendation for a dinner location in town was excellent. I will be returning to this location the next time I am in the area; I can’t say enough good things about it.

I have been waiting over a decade for a space to stay when visiting my family back home in Mansfield with my dog Penny. It’s difficult to find pet friendly hotels in town that make you feel at home. I’ve been driving between Cleveland to Mansfield which takes away from precious time spent with my family. The space itself is pristinely kept, clean and holds every amenity one would need - including a vinyl record collection that will keep you dancing as the daylight fades into night, which you can conveniently watch from the ceiling to floor windows. Once the sun is down you can sit by the electric fireplace and play a little guitar or monopoly. For hometown folks like me the historical building is a true reflection of Mansfield’s glory but the decor itself is another keynote of the space! It’s thoughtfully curated to honor Mansfield’s industrial roots and cultural highlights - Vintage photos line the vaulted ceiling walls, not one but two Timothy Brian McKee Mansfield vintage books sit on the bookshelf near current guides so you can reflect on Mansfields past and present. I cannot wait to come back home more often and know I have a such an incredibly beautiful space to relax and unwind after a long day of catching up with my large family back in Sunny Mansfield.

A wonderful place. High quality accommodations. Tons of thought put into the design and esthetics. Cozy and comfortable. Spacious. Tons of natural light. Walking distance to downtown. Parking free and convenient. Andrew was welcoming, friendly, and readily accessible.
The place is beautifully done. Andrew was a great host. We needed a place to get away for the weekend and we definitely couldn’t have found a better spot. Thank you Andrew

What a treasure! The Voegele loft is a stunning historic property AND totally modern and up-to-date. Our favorite was the comfortable king bed in the beautiful bedroom with floor to ceiling windows. The kitchen is super functional and chic. We’ll definitely book again the next time we are in Mansfield.
hope to come back in the future with amazing communication and beautiful home with lots of room

Our family enjoyed our stay at The Cozy Bluebird. It definitely was cozy. It had everything we needed for a long weekend and the beds were very comfortable. We especially appreciated the ceiling fans in the bedrooms. Thank you Irene we appreciate the use of your home and your quick response and communication.

Cozy and comfy
awesome place. so clean

Great stay! Very nice house and very reasonably priced. Super patio area out back. Everything was clean and in order. Awesome responsive host. Would definitely stay again if we were in town.
Wonder home - very comfortable and well organized. Irene was very welcoming and even accommodated an early arrival. Felt right at home.
This was a lovely home to enjoy during our stay. Very clean, welcoming and close to our Mansfield excursion. She was responsive and helpful. we will be back! highly recommend.
Awesome place

Irene is seriously the best host, ever! Her house is adorable, homey and no clutter. We loved the extra throw blankets! We are ladies in our 50s, and get chilled! We were here for a sisters trip (2 sets) attending a concert at the Renaissance. Super close! The neighborhood is wonderful.
Don’t overthink it! Book this house. You’ll love it and you will love working with Irene! ❤️❤️❤️

Irene's place was great! It's definitely a cozy home in a safe area of Mansfield! It's conveniently located within a 5minute drive to the grocery stores & fast food that's on Lexington Ave. The driveway /parking availability is really nice. The pictures matched reality! The beds were comfy! The living room is spacious (My niece could fit a PacknPlay by the TV & there was still room to walk around). The kitchen area is just beautiful & has everything you'll need to prepare meals! *The kitchen windows don't have full blinds so don't expect privacy there. We had a question about the ice machine on the fridge, so Irene & her husband came right over to help us without a problem (very responsive)! The bathroom was clean with a step-in shower. There's no shortage of hot water which is GREAT but be careful. The washer & dryer was also a great bonus! We didn't get to utilize the enclosed patio or fire pit but we plan to the next time we visit town! Overall, this home was a great place to stay!

this home was clean neat cuteand very comfortable left us treats to say thank you had extra tooth brushes if we for got ours very thoughtful my grand daughters and I loved it would sur stay again thank you very much

Definitely recommend this Air BnB if staying in the Mansfield area.

The TV was very finicky, there is a huge delay with the remote to the Tv and it would just freeze up and close out of the Netflix randomly, the dishwasher was broken ( they didn’t know this prior to our arrival) one of the vents in the room wouldn’t stay open and the room was getting to 85-90 degrees, then we discovered the problem so we wedge a screw in it.
The basement area needs a little love. There is tons of cob webs everywhere and last time there was not. It felt a little more dingy than before.
Other than that it was a good experience. The host was responsive to any messages that I had sent.

Fantastic Air BnB. Irene is a wonderful host. House is super cute, clean and well appointed. Irene left us snacks and water and was always super responsive. this was our second stay here and will absolutely use her rental again.
Great experience with Irene. The house was exactly as she described and she made everything super easy.
We had a wonderful stay! Highly recommend this comfortable home. Extremely clean. Short drive to restaurants and local attractions. Relaxing atmosphere.
Lovely home, very happy with our stay. Irene was very kind and quick to respond to messages. She was generous in our requests and we would stay again!

The property was nice and clean. I would visit the Cozy Bluebird again.

A great place to stay! Very comfortable and clean. Also, the yard is very well kept and even has the golf course cross hatching.
